pr_title: CLDR-13197 make it easier to find more details about an error subtype

timeline.bodyText: How about "Convert this CheckStatus to JSON"?
timeline.author: btangmu

replies.bodyText: Yes, that would be a clearer name.
replies.author: macchiati

timeline.bodyText: How about a subroutine for the "for" loop?
timeline.author: btangmu

replies.bodyText: Not sure how that would help here - this function consists of several state variables, and then the loop, and then several lines of error checking which all depend on the state variables.
replies.author: srl295

timeline.bodyText: Is this a TODO for the current ticket?
timeline.author: btangmu
btangmu
btangmu

replies.bodyText: flush() is called from the JSP, so it is an administrative task.
replies.author: srl295

timeline.bodyText:
this constructor is too long to see all at once on the screen, making the logic harder to check; it could be shortened with subroutines, maybe an object containing the variables newMap ... urlCount
just a suggestion for future improvement, not a blocker for this review
timeline.author: btangmu

timeline.bodyText: here again, subroutines would be nice to avoid having to scroll up and down to see the whole method; the subroutine names could help to clarify what it's doing from a top-down perspective
timeline.author: btangmu
